sense.name: desire, wish, plan, intend
sense.commentary: NP1 HOPE SCOMP[NP2]/PP[NP2] NP1 HOPE SCOMP[NP1]
sense.examples: I hope he understands he was invited to both the wedding and the reception. We can always hope they won't notice. The children hoped for a chocolate cake for dessert. I am hoping to finish medical school in two years. She had hoped to finish the outdoor painting before winter arrived.
